mapper.insert: insert into user set uid=#{uid}, pass=#{pass}, name=#{name}, nick=#{nick}, email=#{email}, hp=#{hp}, zip=#{zip}, addr1=#{addr1}, addr2=#{addr2}, regip=#{regip}, role=#{role}, rdate=NOW()
